attributes.action: Force Google and other search engines to block illegal internet pharmacies
attributes.additional_details:
Falsified medicines are a major threat to public health and safety. 

Currently the MHRA contact internet service providers to block websites. This takes months and doesn't work. Stopping Google displaying these websites is far more effective, faster and easier way to reduce the number of citizens using these illegal sites.

Study from the Uni. of Oxford found 75% of online pharmacies selling anti-biotics are illegal: https://goo.gl/0DoYct

MHRA EU Common Logo Scheme: https://goo.gl/5gpeOA
attributes.background:
Millions of pounds of counterfeit and unlicensed medicines are sold in the UK.  Internet pharmacies must be registered with MHRA and display an internet pharmacy logo.
Demand the government stops Google & Bing from displaying illegal pharmacy websites which are not registered with the MHRA.
